text: (ai rasool) ahale kitaab (yahoodee) jo tumase (ye) darakhvaast karate hain ki tum unapar ek kitaab aasamaan se utarava do (tum usaka khyaal na karo kyonki) ye log moosa se to isase kaheen badh (badh) ke darakhvaast kar chuke hain chunaanche kahane lage ki hamen khuda ko khullam khulla dikha do tab unakee sharaarat kee vajah se bijalee ne le daala phir (baavajood ke) un logon ke paas tauheed kee vaajaie aur raushan (daleelen) aa chukee thee usake baad bhee un logon ne bachhade ko (khuda) bana liya phir hamane usase bhee daraguzar kiya aur moosa ko hamane sareehee galaba ata kiya
